archimate:BusinessCollaboration.name: Resilience Direct
archimate:BusinessCollaboration.documentation: A common information platform for central and local resilience commissioned by the Cabinet Office and supported by Ordnance Survey (launched in March 2014). The service enables emergency planners and responders to work collaboratively across their organisations and share information across agencies throughout the UK. The target audience is all the Category 1 and 2 responders, government departments and agencies and other key organisations in the UK resilience community.
